com.mambu.apisdk.services
Class UsersService

java.lang.Object
  com.mambu.apisdk.services.UsersService

public class UsersService
extends java.lang.Object

Service class which handles API operations like getting and creating users. When getting users, for safety reasons the API call will have the response stripped of some fields: - transactionLimits - password - apiAppId - apiAppKey - preferences - permissions

Author:
ipenciuc

public java.util.List<com.mambu.core.shared.model.User> getUsers(java.lang.String offset,
                                                                 java.lang.String limit)
                                                          throws MambuApiException
Get all the users with offset and limit

Parameters:
offset - the offset of the response. If not set a value of 0 is used by default
limit - the maximum number of response entries. If not set a value of 50 is used by default
Returns:
List of all Users
Throws:
MambuApiException

                                                                 java.lang.String offset,
                                                                 java.lang.String limit)
                                                          throws MambuApiException
Get a paginated list of users filtered by branch

Parameters:
branchId - the id of the branch to filter with
offset - the offset of the response. If not set a value of 0 is used by default
limit - the maximum number of response entries. If not set a value of 50 is used by default
Returns:
list of Users

getUserByUsername

public com.mambu.core.shared.model.User getUserByUsername(java.lang.String userName)
                                                   throws MambuApiException
Get User by it's userName. NOTE: This is just a convenience method, it uses the getById() API. One can use getById() diretcly too.

Parameters:
userName - the username of the user to filter
Returns:
User - with full details
Throws:
MambuApiException
